name: 林靖國
objective:
介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), 
Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.
schedule:
1 Fundamental Principles
 2 Working Stresses and Failure Theories
 3 Design of Shafts
 4 Springs
 5 Screws
 6 Belts, Clutches, Brakes, and Chains
 7 Welded and Riveted Connections
 8 Ball and Roller Bearings
 9 Spur Gears
 10 Helical, Bevel, and Worm Gears
 11 Miscellaneous Machine Elements
